bibl.title: Jews and Gentiles in the Holy Land in the Days of the Second Temple, the Mishnah and the Talmud. A Collection of Articles

bibl.seg: MODRZEJEWSKI (MÉLÈZE MODRZEJEWSKI) Joseph, "Filios Suos Tantum". Roman Law and Jewish Identity.

Menachem MOR, Aharon OPPENHEIMER, Jack PASTOR, and Daniel R. SCHWARTZ (Edd.), Jews and Gentiles in the Holy Land in the Days of the Second Temple, the Mishnah and the Talmud. A Collection of Articles (Jerusalem, 2003) pp. 108-136.
Pp. 117-123: la circoncision des Juifs et des prêtres égyptiens face à la législation romaine.
